mapper.sql: u.id as id, u.version as version, u.login_name as loginName, u.login_pwd as loginPwd, u.salt as salt, u.user_code as userCode, u.user_name as userName, u.mobile_no as mobileNo, u.email as email, u.status as status, u.user_source as userSource, u.type as type, u.last_login_ip as lastLoginIp, u.remark as remark, u.last_login_time as lastLoginTime, u.is_changed_pwd as isChangedPwd, u.pwd_error_count as pwdErrorCount, u.pwd_error_time as pwdErrorTime, u.creator as creator, u.creator_id as creatorId, u.created_time as createdTime, u.last_operator as lastOperator, u.last_operator_id as lastOperatorId, u.update_time as updateTime, u.last_login_location as lastLoginLocation
mapper.select: SELECT , g.id as groupId, g.group_name as groupName FROM pc_uac_user u LEFT JOIN pc_uac_group_user gu on u.id = gu.user_id LEFT JOIN pc_uac_group g on gu.group_id = g.id WHERE u.id = #{userId}
